comments.body: The name of the package is `libmad` however the directory the recipe is in is `mad`. Could you please send a follow-up PR to staged-recipes to fix this discrepancy at @dschreij ? Currently this recipe (and a few others) are stuck in limbo until that happens.
Filed as a new issue ( https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/issues/2093 ) so that we can keep track of it.
